name: part_000
file: tmp_【新3Dお披露目】周防パトラ生誕祭！ゲスト FUWAMOCO＆豪華ビデオレター！重大告知あり！Birthday Party 2025【周防パトラ】 [bubs05N-m04]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening intro loop with countdown and theme song performance.
Second iteration of the opening intro loop.

subtitles.original:
周防パトラ 誕生3Dライブ 2025
重大発表あり！ 3D新髪型お披露目
subtitles.english:
Suou Patra Birthday 3D Live 2025
Major Announcement! 3D New Hairstyle Reveal

subtitles.original: Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra!
subtitles.english: Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra!

subtitles.original: パトラ！パトラ！パトラ！パトラ！
subtitles.english: Patra! Patra! Patra! Patra!

subtitles.original: Here we go!
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: Ready?
subtitles.english: Ready?

subtitles.original: Happy Happy Birthday 今日は最高な記念日
subtitles.english: Happy Happy Birthday! Today is the best anniversary!

subtitles.original: 君と一緒に笑い合おう 準備はいいかな？
subtitles.english: Let's laugh together! Are you ready?

subtitles.original: パパパパトラと踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: Let's dance all night with Pa-pa-pa-Patra!

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝く世界へ 行こう！
subtitles.english: Let's go to a sparkling world!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra!
subtitles.english: Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra! Go Patra!

subtitles.original: パトラ！パトラ！パトラ！パトラ！
subtitles.english: Patra! Patra! Patra! Patra!

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: ドキドキしちゃうよ 視線感じて
subtitles.english: My heart is racing, feeling your gaze

subtitles.original: ドレスに着替えて 魔法をかけて
subtitles.english: Change into a dress and cast a spell

subtitles.original: 尻尾をフリフリ リズムに乗れば
subtitles.english: Wiggle my tail and get into the rhythm

subtitles.original: みんなのハートを 奪っちゃうぞ！
subtitles.english: I'm gonna steal everyone's hearts!

subtitles.original: ワン！ツー！ワンツー！スリー！
subtitles.english: One! Two! One-two! Three!

subtitles.original: 甘い声で 囁くよ
subtitles.english: I'll whisper with a sweet voice

subtitles.original: 耳元で 好きって言っちゃうかも？
subtitles.english: I might even say "I love you" in your ear.

subtitles.original: 照れちゃうけど 本気なんだから
subtitles.english: I'm shy, but I'm serious

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ててね 私のこと
subtitles.english: Make sure you look at me
